settings.content: Offering three types of service packages. Our mechanic brings his expertise from the continental tour and provides the highest level of service on road and gravel bikes. Please book your appointment below.

settings.section_content: Every appointment begins with an assessment from our professional mechanic to determine your unique requirements. We will provide you with a detailed estimate and timeline before service begins.

Frame and wheels wiped down and surface gunk removed

Front and Rear wheel alignment check (truing extra)

Derailleur limits set (front and rear)

Shifting checked and adjusted

Inspect chain, cassette, chain ring, rotors and pads wear

Handlebar alignment

Set wheel skewers, nuts and axle at proper torque

Headset preload and stem bolts checked (5Nm)

Check pulley wheels wear (parts and install extra)

Inspect brake pad contact on rim/rotor and adjusted (parts and install extra)

Brake calipers aligned to rim or rotor

Crank arms, pedals and seat rail bolts checked

Tires inflated to proper pressure

Chain lubed and wiped

Test ridden and Inspected again

We will notify you of any additional parts and repairs that may be needed and go over it with you

Starting at $200 + tax

Our most popular Tune-up!

Everything from the Comprehensive Tune-up is included

Plus:

We remove the Crankset, Cassette, Front & Rear Derailleur, Chain and Pulley Wheel off the bike and clean them individually and meticulously in a parts tray to an ultimate sparkle. This will completely refresh and reset your drivetrain.

Test ridden and Inspected again

Starting at $400 + tax

Everything from the Comprehensive and Ultimate Tune-up is included

Plus:

Entire Drivetrain removed from Frame and Cleaned to perfection

Headset and Bottom Bracket removed from the Frame and immaculately cleaned

Professional Wash, Wax and Polish

Wheels True & Re-Tension (0.05~0.1 mm)

Chain Lubrication and Re-grease Bottom Bracket and Headset Bearing

Test ridden and Inspected again

Giving your bike a fresh full reset!

Starting at $760 + tax

settings.content-1: We offer repair service on damaged carbon frames and carbon wheels. Starting at $250.
settings.content-2: Weâ€™d be happy to build your perfect bike! Our bike builds begin with a consultation with our professional and experienced mechanic to determine your unique needs and provide recommendations based on your desires. We are experts in building road and gravel bikes. Please fill out the form below and we can get started on your next dream bike!
